price: (23) And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
